categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: Reeqo Swen was a male Jenet Padawan in the New Jedi Order. In 43.5 ABY Swen and another apprentice, Melari Ruxon, assisted Jedi Knight Leia Organa Solo and her husband, Han Solo, in the detainment of the insane Jedi Bazel Warv and Yaqeel Saav'etu. Shortly after, however, Swen and Ruxon decided to resign from the Order, as they were unhappy with the way Daala was beginning to take control of the Jedi.
